meanings.definition: To move toward or arrive at a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The bus comes to the bus stop every morning.
meanings.sent2: She comes home from school at 3 o'clock.
meanings.sent3: The cat comes to the door when it's time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: Hope comes knocking when you least expect it.
meanings.sent5: The sun comes up in the east every day.

meanings.sent1: The party comes after the school play.
meanings.sent2: Rain comes when the clouds are dark.
meanings.sent3: Laughter comes easily when friends are around.
meanings.sent4: Success comes to those who work hard.

meanings.sent1: Help comes when you ask for it.
meanings.sent2: Opportunities come to those who seek them.
meanings.sent3: Joy comes in small moments of kindness.

meanings.definition: To originate or be derived from a particular source.
meanings.sent1: Her talent comes from years of practice.
meanings.sent2: The recipe comes from an old family tradition.
meanings.sent5: Wisdom comes with age and reflection.
